author: Live Mint
title: Ground News - 'Matter of joy': Amit Shah after signing peace accord with ULFA; Biswa Sarma hails 'end' of tribal militancy in Assam
text:
Summary by Live Mint The peace pact with ULFA, which is expected to end decades-old insurgency in Assam, comes after 12 years of unconditional negotiations between the ULFA faction, led by Arabinda Rajkhowa, and the government Share menu More
